sentences.en: "Without prevention and control of the risk factors for obesity now, health systems will be overwhelmed to breaking point, " the editorial says.
sentences.cn: “现在不阻止和控制肥胖的风险因素的话，卫生体制将会招架不住达到一个断裂点，”社论说。

sentences.en: Anorexia nervous probably represents a weight phobia - the fear of obesity.
sentences.cn: 神经性厌食可能表现为一种体重恐怖 —— 即害怕肥胖.

sentences.en: But even in kids who are prone to obesity, lifestyle is what triggers it.
sentences.cn: 但是即使在容易变成肥胖症患者的孩子中间, 生活方式仍然是引发这种疾病的原因.

sentences.en: But, it warns this progress could be set back if measures are not taken to reverse the rise in obesity among young people.
sentences.cn: 但是，该机构提醒到，如果不采取措施逆转年轻人中不断增加的肥胖情况，这种进展可能会发生倒退。

sentences.en: Current thinking holds that obesity is more a medical than a psychological problem.
sentences.cn: 现在的观点认为，肥胖更多的是医学问题而非心理问题。

sentences.en: Dr.Watson is great on exercise as a cure for obesity.
sentences.cn: 沃森医生把运动看做是治疗肥胖症的良方。

sentences.en: Fast food and sedentary life lead to the increasing rate of obesity.
sentences.cn: 快餐和久坐不动的生活导致肥胖率上升.

sentences.en: French researchers may be on the verge of unlocking the secrets of obesity.
sentences.cn: 法国研究人员有可能正处于揭开肥胖症秘密的边缘.

sentences.en: However, meeting the challenge of obesity is not all that simple.
sentences.cn: 然而, 对付肥胖症的挑战并不那么简单.

sentences.en: In some cases of severe obesity, gastrointestinal surgery may be recommended.
sentences.cn: 某些严重的肥胖症, 可以推荐做胃肠道外科手术.

sentences.en: Obesity and a sedentary lifestyle has been linked with an increased risk of heart disease.
sentences.cn: 肥胖和久坐不动的生活方式被认为会增加患心脏病的几率。

sentences.en: Obesity can increase the risk of heart disease.
sentences.cn: 肥胖会增加患心脏病的危险。

sentences.en: Obesity correlates with increased risk for hypertension and stroke.
sentences.cn: 肥胖会增加高血压和中风发作的几率。

sentences.en: Obesity is a major risk factor in many diseases.
sentences.cn: 肥胖是引发多种疾病的重要因素。

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the curative effects of different methods on simple obesity.
sentences.cn: 目的观察采用不同方法治疗单纯性肥胖症的疗效.

sentences.en: One effect of overeating may be obesity.
sentences.cn: 吃得过多能导致痴肥.

sentences.en: So leptin is the answer to obesity -- right ?
sentences.cn: 这么说肥胖真正的答案与 lepfin 相关,是不是?

sentences.en: So, what of the future of obesity in America?
sentences.cn: 那么，未来美国的肥胖状况会怎么发展呢？

sentences.en: Sugar and fat can more easily lead to obesity than some other foods.
sentences.cn: 糖和脂肪比其他食物更容易导致肥胖.

sentences.en: These photographs show extremes of obesity and emaciation.
sentences.cn: 这些照片展现了肥胖与消瘦两个极端.

sentences.en: What is obesity?
sentences.cn: 什么是肥胖？

sentences.en: When it comes to a potentially new treatment for obesity, what better strategy than to utilize something we already have in abundance?
sentences.cn: 当涉及到肥胖的潜在新疗法，还有什么策略比利用我们多余的东西，以毒攻毒更好呢？

trans.tran_en: when someone is very fat in a way that is unhealthy
